text: Raya and the Last Dragon is a 2021 computer-animated action adventure fantasy movie made by Walt Disney Animation Studios. It was simultenously released on March 5, 2021 in theaters and on Disney+ with a $29.99 premium fee. Raya and the Last Dragon tells the story of a warrior princess who lives in Kumandra, a place where water dragons are the citizens' guardians. When Kumandra is in trouble, Raya and her pet armadillo-pillbug hybrid Tuk-Tuk must stop the destruction before it's too late with the help of the last of the water dragons Sisu. Raya and the Last Dragon was Disney's only animated movie to be simultaneously released in theaters and on Disney+ under the Premier Access title.
